citations.narrative:
Two hutches, housing intact male rabbits, have a build-up of a reddish hard pasty material on the back exterior framework
and one back leg of each hutch. Primary enclosures should be kept reasonably free of debris by periodic cleaning.
Accumulated material on the enclosures must l be removed on a more frequent basis to minimize disease hazards and to
facilitate proper sanitization. Correct by March 11, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees.
End Section

narrative:
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
Two hutches, housing intact male rabbits, have a build-up of a reddish hard pasty material on the back exterior framework 
and one back leg of each hutch. Primary enclosures should be kept reasonably free of debris by periodic cleaning. 
Accumulated material on the enclosures must l be removed on a more frequent basis to minimize disease hazards and to 
facilitate proper sanitization. Correct by March 11, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensees. 
 
End Section
